sections.heading: OUR COMMITMENT
paragraphs: SeaNeB Technologies Pvt Ltd is deeply committed to the safety and wellbeing of children. We have a zero-tolerance policy for content that exploits, abuses, or endangers minors.
We strictly prohibit Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation (CSAE) content of any kind on our platforms.

sections.heading: PROHIBITED CONTENT AND BEHAVIOUR
list: Any content that sexually exploits or abuses minors (CSAM).
Grooming, soliciting, or communicating with a minor for sexual purposes.
Sharing, distributing, or viewing any content that sexualises minors.
Facilitating or encouraging any form of child abuse or trafficking.

sections.heading: REPORTING
paragraphs: If you encounter content or behaviour that violates this policy, please report it immediately to us at hello@seaneb.com, or through the in-app reporting feature.
We will report detected CSAM to the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC) and cooperate fully with law enforcement authorities.

sections.heading: ENFORCEMENT
paragraphs: Any account found to be in violation of this policy will be immediately and permanently banned. We reserve the right to report violators to law enforcement.
We regularly audit our platform and train our moderation teams to identify and remove any such content.
